data.name: Causa, Voices of the Dusk - Wealth Kit
data.detailed_description:
“Wealth is the ability to acquire, hold and control goods of all kinds; whether they are food and shelter to survive, or vast amounts of money, land and valuable objects that allow for a life of luxury and vanity. Through the course of culture, wealth has been associated with the affluent Elite found in almost all forms of society.”

The Wealth Kit will allow you to strengthen your Collection with Wealth Cards (yellow). It includes:

  • 6 Wealth (yellow) Card Packs
  • 500 Organite
  • Unique Wealth Card Back



Each Wealth Card Pack includes 5 Cards of Wealth (yellow) with different Rarity (Common, Rare, Epic, and Legendary), allowing you to start upgrading your Wealth Decks, including the Faction (dual-colored) Decks.

Keep in mind that for every 20 Card Packs you open in the game, you’ll receive a Legendary Card Pack for free. This type of pack guarantees a Legendary Card.



Organite (Crystals) may be spent in the game to buy items such as Leaders (750 Organite), Card Packs (200 Organite), Card Backs (750 Organite), and more!



Add the Unique Wealth Card Back to your collection, and showcase it while battling your enemies. After the end of the Early Access, this item will only be available by acquiring this kit.

This kit can only be purchased on Steam once per account. If you already had the Wealth Card Back in your Collection, you will get all the other items included in the kit, and a full reimbursement of the Card Back in gold.

data.short_description: Causa, Voices of the Dusk is an intriguing turn-based strategy card game with innovative game mechanics. Sacrifice cards to raise your Cause, and bring them back later for unexpected powerful plays. Prove your abilities in battle and draft your way to Victory in extremely challenging campaigns.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 /10 (32-bit or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i3-3225/AMD A8-7650K
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640/Radeon HD 5770
